com.github.dandelion.core.asset.processor.support

Class CssUrlRewriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.asset.processor.support.CssUrlRewriter

  • public class CssUrlRewriter
extends Object

    Rewrites URLs in CSS files according to the new relative location of the CSS file

    Part of this code has been kindly borrowed and adapted from Ibrahim Chaehoi (Jawr Project).

    Since:
    0.10.1
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Detail

      • setContextPath

        public void setContextPath(String contextPath)
        Sets the context path.
        Parameters:
        contextPath - the contextPath to set

      • rewriteUrl

        public StringBuffer rewriteUrl(String originalCssPath,
                      String newCssPath,
                      String originalCssContent)

        Rewrites all URLs present in the originalCssContent using the newCssPath.

        Parameters:
        originalCssPath - the original CSS path.
        newCssPath - the new CSS path.
        originalCssContent - the original CSS content.
        Returns:
        the new CSS content with URLs rewritten.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getUrlPath

        protected String getUrlPath(String matchedUrl,
                String originalPath,
                String newCssPath)
        Transform a matched url so it points to the proper relative path with respect to the given path.
        Parameters:
        matchedUrl - the matched URL
        newCssPath - the full bundle path
        status - the bundle processing status
        Returns:
        the image URL path
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO exception occurs

      • getRewrittenImagePath

        protected String getRewrittenImagePath(String originalCssPath,
                           String newCssPath,
                           String url)
        Returns the rewritten image path
        Parameters:
        originalCssPath - the original Css path
        newCssPath - the new Css path
        url - the image URL
        Returns:
        the rewritten image path
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IOException occurs

      • adaptReplacementToMatcher

        public String adaptReplacementToMatcher(String replacement)

      • getRootRelativePath

        public String getRootRelativePath(String url)
        Returns the relative path of an url to go back to the root. For example : if the url path is defined as "/cssServletPath/css/myStyle.css" -> "../../"
        Parameters:
        url - the requested url
        Returns:
        the relative path of an url to go back to the root.
